articles.author: news.Sportbox.ru
articles.title: Swastika under the flag of Russia. In Europe staged a monstrous provocation before the World Cup - news.Sportbox.ru
articles.description: This article discusses how some German football fans created and sold t-shirts with Nazi symbols and slogans leading up to the 2018 World Cup in Russia. The FIFA organization condemned the shirts and any discriminatory behavior. The article also mentions that the German team did not perform well in the tournament, finishing last in their group.

articles.author: Новости Челябинска – 74.ru
articles.title: Three drones fell in the Moscow region - June 21, 2023
articles.description: Three drones were shot down in the Moscow region using electronic warfare means. Two of them were flying towards the warehouses of a military unit. No injuries or damage were reported. This is not the first time Ukrainian drones have been spotted in Moscow and the region.

articles.author: Игромания
articles.title: The deal between Microsoft and Activision Blizzard may have a new enemy
articles.description: This article discusses the ongoing legal battle against Microsoft's acquisition of Activision Blizzard, with regulators from the US, UK, and New Zealand expressing concerns about the potential impact on competition in cloud gaming. Gamers are also fighting against the deal, with new evidence emerging of Microsoft's intentions to remove Sony PlayStation as their main competitor. The deadline for the deal is July 18th, with hearings scheduled for this month.

articles.author: Росбалт
articles.title: Astrologer Globa named four signs of the zodiac, which will have an incredible chance in July
articles.description: In July, four zodiac signs will have success in unexpected areas, according to astrologer Tamara Globa. Arians will be able to change their lives for the better with a unique opportunity, while Geminis will experience a change in priorities. July will bring absolute success for Virgos in their professional lives, and Capricorns will have victories in their love lives.

articles.author: 3DNews
articles.title: HUAWEI MateBook 16s 2023 (CREFG-X) laptop review: large screen and powerful CPU
articles.description: This article discusses the latest release of the HUAWEI MateBook 16 laptop, which features a 16GB LPDDR5 RAM, a 1TB solid-state drive, and a choice between two Core processors: the i7-13700H or the i9-13900H. Both processors come with an integrated Xe Graphics GPU and have similar specifications. The laptop also has a 16-inch touchscreen display with a 3:2 aspect ratio and a resolution of 2560x1600. The device is housed in a sturdy metal chassis and weighs almost 2kg. The price for the higher-end configuration with the i9-13900H processor is €1,650.

articles.author: Настоящее Время
articles.title: Kyiv returned three Ukrainian prisoners of war handed over to Hungary by Russia
articles.description: The Ukrainian Embassy in Budapest has managed to bring three Ukrainian prisoners of war back to Ukraine from Hungary. The Ukrainian diplomats are continuing to take active measures to return the remaining Ukrainian defenders who were taken from Russia to Hungary. The transfer of the prisoners was facilitated by the Russian Orthodox Church and the Hungarian government denies any involvement. The Ukrainian prisoners were reportedly held in isolation and denied access to open sources of information in Hungary.
